This is an example of a very simple JavaFX application following the MVC-pattern (slightly more strictly as usual).

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.designpatterns.observer
This package implements the observer design pattern with the observed subjects represented as an abstract class Subject and the observers or listeners as an interface Observer.
dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.initial  
dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.initial.controller  
dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.initial.model  
dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.initial.view  
This is an example of a very simple JavaFX application following the MVC-pattern (slightly more strictly as usual). It was made for the course "Project in Software Engineering (02362)" held at the DTU Compute by Ekkart Kindler.

The purpose is to show and discuss different aspects of the MVC-pattern and JavaFX applications. Some of the assignments of the course will be based on this project. In addition, the project is structured in such a way, that project of the course can be based on this project.
